cells.data:
From now on: Coker 201

Row Reduction
3 operations
    1. Swap rows
    2. Scale a row
    3. Add to another row

Row Echelon Form, Reduced REF

Contradiction $\implies$ no solutions

$\matrixstart 0 & 0 & \dots & 0 \matrixend \implies$ infinitely many solutions (degrees of freedom; parameterize)
